sense.def:
An inheritance
je denar ali imetje, ki ga dobimo od nekoga, ki je umrl.

seg.quote: He had no motive for depriving his son of the inheritance.

sense.def:
Inheritance
je dejstvo, da smo rojeni z značilnostmi, ki jo jih imeli naši starši ali predniki.

seg.quote: To what extent does human nature depend on genetic inheritance?
